<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/r600asmprinter">R600AsmPrinter</a> is used to print both assembly string and also binary code.

When passed an MCAsmStreamer it prints assembly and when passed an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcobjectstreamer">MCObjectStreamer</a> it outputs binary code.

## File Listing
